name: The Missing Trail
description:
Today's the day of the Annual Halloween Bonfire! But why is it so... quiet?

The Missing Trail is a short visual novel about community, communication, and Halloween! Follow Tom the ghost as he investigates the mystery of the missing forest trail with the help of his new monster friends! But be careful… there may be mischief afoot!

Features

  • 3.5k words, 15-20 minutes of gameplay, & 1 ending!
  • Cute and whimsically spooky art!
  • Five endearing monsters and one especially friendly ghost!
  • Also maybe the worst Halloween tradition ever for a forest… a bonfire?

Controls

  • Space to advance the text.
  • Arrow keys to choose a dialogue option.

Credits

  • Artist: MadameEtrange 
  • Programmer: Caval
  • Story Development: Jack Concordia
  • Story Development & Writing: Laura Romano

Music by MATRIXXX, available on freesound.org!

Made for the 4th Annual Spooktober Game Jam!
